name: Roo.ColorPalette

config.name: listeners
allowReselect
config.desc: If set to true then reselecting a color that is already selected fires the selection event

config.name: value
config.desc:
The initial color to highlight (should be a valid 6-digit color hex code without the # symbol).  Note that
the hex codes are case-sensitive.

config.name: allowDomMove
config.desc: Whether the component can move the Dom node when rendering (defaults to true).

config.name: itemCls
config.desc: The CSS class to apply to the containing element (defaults to "x-color-palette")

config.name: actionMode
config.desc:
which property holds the element that used for  hide() / show() / disable() / enable()
default is 'el'

config.name: disableClass
config.desc: CSS class added to the component when it is disabled (defaults to "x-item-disabled").

methods.name: select
methods.desc: Selects the specified color in the palette (fires the select event)

params.name: color
params.desc: A valid 6-digit color hex code (# will be stripped if included)

removing the component from its {@link Roo.Container} (if applicable) and unregistering it from {@link Roo.ComponentMgr}.
